settings.title: Layer effortlessly
settings.text: Alta 8 Armwear is the perfect way to layer without the bulk of an additional garment. The flexible materials make them a wonderful accessory for any lifestyle. Pair them under a uniform for sun protection or to transform any outfit to a modest one.

settings.title: Bring a pair everywhere
settings.text: Alta 8 arm sleeves for women are light, compact, and portable. Keep a pair in your bag, at the office, in the car. Perfect to travel with, each pair comes in their own sleeper, offering more outfit options for your life -on the go.

settings.title: SUN PROTECTION SLEEVES FOR YOUR ARMS
settings.text: If you're looking for a quick and easy way to cover your arms on a sunny day, Alta 8 has styles that are easy to pair with whatever you wear. If you're looking for the perfect sun protection arm sleeves, look no further.

settings.title: na'maste in bed
settings.text: This is an Image with text content block that you can add to your product page by using the product.details template included in the Turbo theme. Use some high impact images to promote cross-sales, or try a team photo and link to your About page, to tell visitors more about the folks behind the products.

settings.title: introducing a flexible new page template
settings.content:
A great "About" page helps build trust between you and your customers.
The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store.
An interesting and authentic About page can even increase sales, so spend time crafting a compelling one!

settings.image_caption_top: Time to get excited about our new collection for Men!

settings.title: Not sure how to wear it?
Sam Wilder
settings.description: Yoga has the power to heal. I love sharing my passion with my team and the community.

settings.title: Sonja Coles
settings.description: I love creating beautiful visuals and collaborating with partnerships.

settings.title: Meet our Portland crew
settings.text: Whether it's running, dancing, yoga, pilates, boxing, or trampolining - we all love moving, and believe that movement heals your soul. We are a dynamic crew of likeminded folks who care about the wellness of others in our community. We love partnering with other locals for events and collaborations, and are always open to new ideas. We focus on bringing people together in our space where everybody is always welcome.

settings.title: Arm sleeves that work with whatever you wear
settings.content: The concept of Alta 8 began with a simple idea of layering without disturbing the rest of your outfit. Simply put, you don't always need an outer layer to keep warm (especially indoors). What you need is a warm and easy way to layer for your arms. From velvets and lace, from mesh to matte, we got you covered, literally.

settings.contact_content:
Thank you for your interest - We're thrilled that you want to work with us.

Please note:
1. We are currently not opening any online or mobile boutique dealers
2. The submission of this inquiry does not guarantee your status as an authorized dealer
3. We require a $500 minimum opening order
4. We are only accepting dealers that are currently open for business with an established retail selection
